title: Rent to Own in Royal Oak. 3 Beds, 2 Baths
posting_body: Incredible modern Royal Oak Ranch close to all of Metro Detroit's best areas to eat drink shop and be merry :) Just minutes from downtown Royal Oak, downtown Ferndale, downtown Birmingham and Downtown Detroit and conveniently located near tons of national anchors like CVS, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Walmart and more!
Brand new kitchen, wood floors, Quarts countertops, high end prefabricated hard flooring in the basement for additional living space.
great backyard for entertaining and two car garage!
For  Details & Photos Of This Property***
Brought to you by Lori Anderson at RE/MAX Classic - Farmington Hills
